Introduction
This topic contains information about intake site responsibilities, including
National Work Queue (NWQ) routing of BDD claims
special claims-handling procedures for BDD claims
BDD claims from former Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) participants returned to duty
actions to take in Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS) when required development actions are complete
, and
follow-up requirements for Examination Management System (EMS) and Compensation and Pension Record Interchange (CAPRI) examinations
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section C - Division of Responsibilities â€“ Benefits Delivery at Discharge (BDD) and BDD-Excluded Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section C
